mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveListTeacherQualificationHistory */ TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , SEQNO AS "seqNo" , QUAL_NM AS "qualificationName" , QUAL_DESC AS "qualificationDesc" , STRT_DT AS "startDate" , END_DT AS "endDate" FROM FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS WHERE TCH_ID = #{teacherID} AND STRT_DT <> '09' ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT /* RetrieveTeacherQualificationHistoryDetail */ TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , SEQNO AS "seqNo" , QUAL_NM AS "qualificationName" , QUAL_DESC AS "qualificationDesc" , STRT_DT AS "startDate" , END_DT AS "endDate" FROM FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS WHERE TCH_ID = #{teacherID} AND SEQNO = #{seqNo} AND STRT_DT <> '09' LIMIT 1
SELECT /* RetrieveLatestSeqNo */ SEQNO AS "seqNo" FROM FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS WHERE TCH_ID = #{teacherID} AND STRT_DT <> '09' ORDER BY SEQNO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterTeacherQualificationHistory */ INTO FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS ( TCH_ID , SEQNO , QUAL_NM , QUAL_DESC , STRT_DT , END_DT , CERT_DT , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{teacherID} , #{seqNo} , COALESCE(#{qualificationName}, '') , COALESCE(#{qualificationDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{startDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{endDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{certificatedDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateTeacherQualification */ FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS SET QUAL_NM = COALESCE(#{qualificationName}, QUAL_NM) , QUAL_DESC = COALESCE(#{qualificationDesc}, QUAL_DESC) , STRT_DT = COALESCE(#{startDate}, STRT_DT) , END_DT = COALESCE(#{endDate}, END_DT) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE TCH_ID = #{teacherID} AND SEQNO = #{seqNo}
